Ventilation.Description: Ventilation helps to facilitate the movement of air, ensuring proper airflow within a space.
Ventilation systems utilize ductwork to distribute and direct the airflow throughout a building.
Ventilation plays a crucial role in improving indoor air quality by removing pollutants and circulating fresh air.
Ventilation is an integral part of HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) systems, contributing to overall comfort and energy efficiency.
